title: The One With The Dirty Girl

questions.question: What does Ross say Cheryl is, aside from a paleontology doctoral candidate?
options: A model
A chef
A spokesmodel or an aerobics instructor
A doctor
questions.correct_answer: A spokesmodel or an aerobics instructor
questions.explanation: Ross mentions that Rachel asks if Cheryl is a spokesmodel or an aerobics instructor.

questions.question: What is the name of the book that Chandler gives to Kathy as a birthday gift?
options: The Velveteen Rabbit
The Little Prince
Alice in Wonderland
To Kill a Mockingbird
questions.explanation: Chandler gives Kathy an early edition of her favorite book, The Velveteen Rabbit.

questions.question: Why does Monica turn down a job catering a funeral?
options: Because she doesn't have the right equipment
Because she doesn't have enough money
Because she doesn't have the time
Because the funeral is too small
questions.correct_answer: Because she doesn't have the money or the equipment
questions.explanation: Monica turns down the job because she doesn't have the money or the equipment to handle it.

questions.question: What does Joey give Kathy as a birthday gift?
options: A pen that is also a clock
A book by her favorite author
A piece of jewelry
A coupon for a massage
questions.correct_answer: A pen that is also a clock
questions.explanation: Joey gives Kathy a pen that is also a clock, which he claims is two gifts in one.

questions.question: What is the condition of Cheryl's apartment when Ross visits her?
options: It's spotless and organized
It's a bit cluttered but clean
It's very messy and dirty
It's empty and unfurnished
questions.explanation: Cheryl's apartment is described as looking like a 'sewage dump exploded' and being extremely messy and dirty.

questions.question: Why does Ross initially hesitate to go inside Cheryl's apartment?
options: Because he is afraid of her
Because he is not interested in her
Because her apartment is very messy and dirty
Because he is tired
questions.correct_answer: Because her apartment is very messy and dirty
questions.explanation: Ross is taken aback by the state of Cheryl's apartment and is hesitant to go inside.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to help Monica with the catering business?
options: She lends Monica money to buy equipment
She helps Monica with the cooking
She takes care of the finances
She helps Monica with the marketing
questions.correct_answer: She lends Monica money to buy equipment and takes care of the finances
questions.explanation: Phoebe lends Monica money to buy equipment and later helps her by taking care of the finances and dealing with a difficult client.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that Mrs. Burkart sings at the funeral?
options: Jeepers Creepers
You're a Grand Old Flag
The Lullaby of Broadway
All of the above
questions.explanation: Mrs. Burkart sings multiple songs at the funeral, including 'Jeepers Creepers', 'You're a Grand Old Flag', and 'The Lullaby of Broadway'.

questions.question: Why does Monica decide to become partners with Phoebe in the catering business?
options: Because Phoebe is a good cook
Because Phoebe has experience with finances
Because they have fun together and Phoebe can handle the money
Because Phoebe has connections in the food industry
questions.correct_answer: Because they have fun together and Phoebe can handle the money
questions.explanation: Monica decides to partner with Phoebe because they have fun together and Phoebe can handle the finances, while Monica can focus on the cooking.

questions.question: What does Ross use to defend himself against the rat in Cheryl's apartment?
options: A tennis racket and a toilet brush
A baseball bat and a broom
A knife and a frying pan
A vacuum cleaner and a mop
questions.correct_answer: A tennis racket and a toilet brush
questions.explanation: Ross uses a tennis racket and a toilet brush to defend himself against the rat in Cheryl's apartment.

questions.question: What does Chandler reveal to Kathy about the gift he got her?
options: That he bought it himself
That Joey helped him pick it out
That it was very expensive
That he had nothing to do with it
questions.correct_answer: That he had something to do with it, but doesn't directly admit it
questions.explanation: Chandler doesn't directly admit to buying the gift, but Kathy suspects that he had something to do with it.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Monica's attempt to get paid by Mrs. Burkart?
options: Mrs. Burkart pays Monica immediately
Mrs. Burkart refuses to pay Monica
Phoebe intervenes and gets Mrs. Burkart to pay
Monica decides to waive the payment
questions.correct_answer: Phoebe intervenes and gets Mrs. Burkart to pay
questions.explanation: Phoebe steps in and demands that Mrs. Burkart pay Monica for the catering services.

questions.question: What does Gunther do when Rachel finishes her crossword puzzle?
options: He congratulates her and gives her a hug
He ignores her and walks away
He tries to hug her but slips and falls
He takes the puzzle away from her
questions.correct_answer: He tries to hug her but slips and falls
questions.explanation: Gunther tries to hug Rachel to congratulate her on finishing the crossword puzzle, but he slips and falls.

questions.question: What does Monica offer to do for Cheryl after Ross tells her about Cheryl's apartment?
options: She offers to help Cheryl clean her apartment
She offers to cook dinner for Cheryl
She offers to lend Cheryl some money
She offers to give Cheryl some advice
questions.correct_answer: She offers to help Cheryl clean her apartment
questions.explanation: Monica offers to help Cheryl clean her apartment after Ross tells her about the state of the apartment.

questions.question: What is the reason why Ross is hesitant to go to Cheryl's apartment?
options: He is afraid of her
He is not interested in her
He is hesitant due to the state of her apartment
He is busy
questions.correct_answer: He is hesitant due to the state of her apartment
questions.explanation: Ross is hesitant to go to Cheryl's apartment because of its extremely messy and dirty state.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Kathy when he gives her the gift?
options: He says it's because he knows she likes rabbits and cheese
He says it's because he knows she likes clocks and pens
He says it's because he knows she likes books and reading
He says it's because he knows she likes him
questions.correct_answer: He says it's because he knows she likes rabbits and cheese
questions.explanation: Joey gives Kathy the gift and says it's because he knows she likes rabbits and cheese, which is not the real reason Chandler got the gift.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Kathy when she thanks him for the gift?
options: He says he's glad she likes it
He says he had nothing to do with it
He says he got it for her because he knows Joey likes her
He says he got it for her because he knows she likes rabbits
questions.correct_answer: He says he had something to do with it, but doesn't directly admit it
questions.explanation: Chandler doesn't directly admit to getting the gift, but Kathy suspects that he had something to do with it.

questions.question: What is the name of the era that Cheryl specializes in as a paleontology doctoral candidate?
options: Centazoic era
Mesozoic era
Cenozoic era
Paleozoic era
questions.explanation: Cheryl is a paleontology doctoral candidate specializing in the Cenozoic era, although Ross mentions 'centazoic' which seems to be a mistake.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Monica when Monica is hesitant to ask for payment from Mrs. Burkart?
options: She says Monica should just forget about the payment
She says Monica should be more aggressive in asking for payment
She says Monica should offer to do more work for free
She says Monica should wait until later to ask for payment
questions.correct_answer: She says Monica should be more aggressive in asking for payment
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Monica to be more aggressive in asking for payment and not to back down.
